pr_title: Extend DD_TRACE_METHODS to support wildcarded method argument

timeline.message: add support for wildcards in place of method names
update transformer to support wildcard method config
fix instrumentation and add initial test

timeline.bodyText: I think toString should also be included, along with getters and setters.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.message: modify element matchers and add initial tests
add testing for interfaces and abstract classes

timeline.bodyText: I thought spotless check should fail on star imports ...
timeline.author: lpriima

replies.bodyText: it's a limitation of spotless, but you can add a custom rule for this: diffplug/spotless#240 (comment)
replies.author: mcculls

replies.bodyText: @ziquanmiao could you change this wildcard import to explicit imports of the used types?
replies.author: mcculls

replies.bodyText: ill fix and explicitly import the ones I use
replies.author: ziquanmiao

timeline.bodyText: This now accepts spaces in package/class names which doesn't sound right
timeline.author: mcculls

timeline.bodyText: I'd also add isFinalizer because I've seen issues intercepting that in the past on other AOP systems
timeline.author: mcculls

replies.bodyText: and test that calls each of these method types and no span is created
replies.author: lpriima

timeline.message: explicit imports, remove whitespace, add finalizer support
ignore getters and setters and update test for abstract classes
